name: SANGOKU XIANGQI
description:
Authentic Sangokushi strategy board game

This game is a strategy board game set in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
Victory is achieved by taking the headquarters or defeating a unit (piece) with a military commander.
Command a variety of units with different abilities and aim for victory!

Fight strong opponents in online battles!

This game supports online battles.
Enjoy playing against players from all over the world!

Form a formation considering offense and defense!

Before the battle, you can freely arrange various pieces and form a formation.
The key to victory is to think about the balance between offense and defense and form a formation.

A big damage attack from behind the piece!

Pieces are vulnerable to attacks from behind.
It is also an important strategy to take advantage of mobility and attack from the side or from behind.

Summon a warlord using the Warlord Souls! Collect beautiful warlord cards!

You can get Warlord Souls by winning battles or by making purchases.
You can summon new warlords by using warlord souls.
Collect unique military commander cards and use them properly in battle.

Purchase weapons and schemes with rewards!

If you win the battle, you will get "Wu Zhu Coin".
If you go to the store, you can buy weapons and schemes for Wu Zhu Coin.
Make full use of weapons and strategies to advance the battlefield more favorably.
